prompts: Create a Pokemon with green foliage and a sturdy body, resembling a goat.
Show me a creature that combines the strength of a mountain goat with lush greenery.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in grassy areas and has a unique horned appearance.
Generate a design for a Pokemon that symbolizes nature and stability with earthy colors.
Make a Pokemon that has a friendly demeanor and looks like it belongs in the forest.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies the essence of grasslands and has a robust physique.
Design a creature that blends agricultural elements with a powerful quadrupedal form.
